summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4834 for the improvement of the alley in block 8, A.B. Graham's University Addition, being the alley from East 50th Street to East 53rd Street, between 7th Avenue Northeast and 8th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55708, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
